name: The Last Jeli
description:
"The Planet of the Jeli is falling apart. When they realise it, they start running away from the world breaking up, and are now racing for the last spot in the only spaceship for escaping the planet."

A small procedurally generated competitive runner game, where you play as Jeli, that can shoot each other with JeliPort in order to teleport to the other Jeli's position, in this wacky space world, in order to get to the last ship of the crumbling planet.

Enjoy and make sure to tell us what you think in the comments!

*Controllers are advised for playing multiple people.*

Credits:

Oliver D.J. Christensen - Concept & 3D Artist

Sarah Marcussen - Concept, 2D & 3D Artist

The game was created over 3 weeks as part of a collaboration between Master and Bachelor Students of The Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts, School of Design.
